individualId.description: The individual id. UIN or VID.

otpChannels.description: Otp channels using which user will be notified, for example - EMAIL, PHONE

post.description:
This api is used to generate otp for wallet binding.
This api is used as a proxy to call [Identity Provider - Send Binding OTP Endpoint](https://mosip.stoplight.io/docs/identity-provider/a34e5371d4876-send-binding-otp-endpoint-draft) api internally.

authFactorType.description: Auth factor type to be binded for the provided key.

format.description: Format of the auth factor type supported in the wallet app. Right now Inji supports only jwt.

individualId.description: The individual id. UIN or VID.

publicKey.description: The public key of the wallet app.

authFactorType.description: Defines the type of auth challenge. It should be same as authfactor.type (oauth-details response).

challenge.description: Actual challenge as string. A jwt in case of inji.

certificate.description: Server certificate after successful binding. This certificate will be stored in wallet app.

encryptedWalletBindingId.description: the wallet binding id in encrypted format. The wallet app will associate the requested credential with this id.

expireDateTime.description: expiry date time of the binding.

post.description:
This api is used to bind the credential   with wallet.
This api is used as a proxy to call [Identity Provider - Wallet binding Endpoint](https://mosip.stoplight.io/docs/identity-provider/6e91115b16311-wallet-binding-endpoint) api internally.

response.message: Notification has been sent to the provided email
Notification has been sent to the provided email

errors.errorMessage: Input transactionID does not match transactionID of OTP Request

post.description: callback uri used by websub to notify

get.description: get all configurable properties for inji.

errors.errorMessage: Unsupported Authentication Type for child - otp
Unsupported Authentication Type for child - otp

post.description: get individual id using application id
post.summary: Request Id for an application Id
